tweet: I am thrilled to announce that on Flag Day we will honor Vietnam Veterans and provide them with Vietnam Veteran lapel pins to recognize Vietnam Veterans for their service to our nation. Please visit my website for information on how to apply for the pin: https://larson.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/larson-honors-vietnam-veterans-national-vietnam-veterans-day-announces …
When Vietnam Veterans returned home they did not receive the welcome they deserved. On National Vietnam War Veterans Day, we honor them and thank them for their service.

These cuts are attacks on working Americans to pay for tax cuts for our nation’s wealthiest that added $2 trillion to the debt. https://larson.house.gov/media-center/press-releases/larson-budget-dead-arrival …

The Administration’s #budget that was released today is dead on arrival. It proposes up to $72 billion in cuts to Social Security and $845 billion to Medicare. Social Security and Medicare aren’t entitlements. They're the insurance that American people pay for.
